Control Name: PERSONNEL SCREENING | INFORMATION WITH SPECIAL PROTECTION MEASURES
Control Statement: The organization ensures that individuals accessing an information system processing, storing, or transmitting information requiring special protection: (a)   Have valid access authorizations that are demonstrated by assigned official government duties; and (b)   Satisfy [Assignment: organization-defined additional personnel screening criteria].Supplemental Guidance:  Organizational information requiring special protection includes, for example, Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI) and Sources and Methods Information (SAMI). Personnel security criteria include, for example, position sensitivity background screening requirements.
